ground_truth.thought: 获取中石油过去一年的股票价格数据
ground_truth.name: Stock.get_historical_prices

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'MarketAnalysis.get_report', 'description': 'Get the latest market analysis report', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the region of the market analysis report'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'the content of the market analysis report'}]}, {'name': 'Stock.get_historical_prices', 'description': 'Get historical stock prices', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the company'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the time period for the historical prices'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'prices', 'description': 'the historical stock prices'}]}, {'name': 'Company.get_capacity_info', 'description': 'Get company capacity and project information', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the company'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'capacity_info', 'description': 'the capacity and project information of the company'}]}, {'name': 'Stock.get_stock_code', 'description': 'Get the stock code of a company', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the company'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'stock_code', 'description': 'the stock code of the company'}]}, {'name': 'Investment.get_advice', 'description': 'Get investment advice for a stock', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'stock_code', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the stock code of the company'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'the investment advice for the stock'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
作为一名投资分析师，我打算分析亚洲能源股的投资机会。首先，获取最新的亚洲能源市场分析报告。然后，获取中石油过去一年的股票价格数据。接着，查询中石油的产能和项目信息。最后，通过公司名称获取中石油的股票代码，并获取一些投资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的亚洲能源市场分析报告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'region'的值是什么?

{'report': 'The Asian energy market has seen significant growth in the past year, driven by increasing demand for oil and gas. Key players like PetroChina (中石油) have expanded their operations, and the market is expected to remain robust in the coming years.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'report': 'The Asian energy market has seen significant growth in the past year, driven by increasing demand for oil and gas. Key players like PetroChina (中石油) have expanded their operations, and the market is expected to remain robust in the coming years.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取中石油过去一年的股票价格数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
